thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Christian L.

author: Christian L.
title: Christian L.
text:
I had a great time at NY Z Hotel. The booking on the amoma.com webpage was very easy and I got a fantastic price.
The Z Hotel New York City is great! The personeel is very friendly and cooperativ! The cleaner made a perfect job. The room was nice and the view of the NY skyline is awesome!!! There is and shuttle service for the hitel to Manhattan every hour for free. The WiFi ist fast,
Thx for all
